entries.text: This game uses an autosave function. Do not turn off the PC while the save indicator ㌣ is shown at the top of the screen.
Starting in offline mode. Multiplayer, messages, rankings, and other such network features will not be available. To play online, select "Go online" from Title Menu.
Starting in offline mode. Multiplayer, messages, leaderboards, and other such network features will not be available.
Checking save data. Do not power off the PC.
Saving save data. Do not power off the PC.
Creating save data. Do not power off the PC.
Loading character data. Do not power off the PC.
Loading calibrations. Do not power off the PC.
Saving calibrations. Do not power off the PC.

There is insufficient space on the hard disk drive. To play DARK SOULS Ⅱ, at least %d MB of free space is required.
Please quit the game and make space on the hard disk drive before starting DARK SOULS Ⅱ again.

The save data is corrupt. Attempt to restore it? Corrupt character data will be deleted.
If "No" is selected the save data will be rechecked.

The save data was not loaded correctly. Create new save data? The original data will be overwritten.
If "No" is selected the data will be rechecked.

The save data could not be restored. Create new save data? The original data will be overwritten.
If "No" is selected the data will be rechecked.

There is insufficient space on the hard disk drive. To play DARK SOULS Ⅱ, at least %d MB of free space is required.
Please restart the game once you have sufficient space on the hard disk drive. Closing this dialog box will exit the game.

Failed to create save data. Quit DARK SOULS Ⅱ and manually delete save data.
Close this dialog box to make another attempt to create save data.

Failed to create save data. Attempting to create it again...
Selecting "Cancel" will exit the game. Please delete the save data manually.
The game version and save data version are different. Quit the game and use the Steam client to update DARK SOULS Ⅱ to the latest version.

The game may not have been exited properly the last time you played. When you wish to quit the game, please select Quit Game from the menu and exit the game after reaching the title screen. Failure to quit the game properly can result in the loss of recent progress.
Unable to play in online mode as you are not connected to Steam.

Unable to play in online mode due to a detected frame rate issue.
Please restart the game after resolving the issue to play online.
Logging in to the DARK SOULS Ⅱ game server...
Your account is currently blocked from accessing the DARK SOULS Ⅱ game server services. Please see the following URL for more information: %s
The DARK SOULS Ⅱ game server is not currently available. Please see the following URL for more information: %s
You do not have the latest version of the game. If you would like to play in online mode, quit the game, and use the Steam client to update to the latest version of DARK SOULS Ⅱ.
Cannot log in to the DARK SOULS Ⅱ game server because it has been stopped or is undergoing maintenance. %s Select "OK" to attempt to log in again, or "Cancel" to start the game in offline mode.

The DARK SOULS Ⅱ service is not available. Please try again later. Please see the following URL for more information: %s Select "OK" to attempt to log in again. Select "CANCEL" to start the game in offline mode.
Cheating detected on your account by Valve Anti-Cheat. You may no longer utilize services provided by the DARK SOULS Ⅱ Servers.

The DARK SOULS Ⅱ service is not available. Please try again later.
Try again?

Failed to initialize online mode.
Trying to reconnect. If "Cancel" is selected the game will start in offline mode.
Cannot load this profile as it is from a later version of the currently installed game. Quit the game, sign in to Steam, and download the latest update for DARK SOULS Ⅱ.
Due to repeated illegal multiplayer disconnects, your connection to other worlds was lost. Only a Bone of Order can restore your connection.
The connection to the DARK SOULS Ⅱ game server was lost. Returning to Title Menu.
You have disconnected from Steam. Returning to Title Menu.
No LAN cable is connected. Returning to Title Menu.
Cannot connect to network. Returning to Title Menu.
